name: Bird Memory
description: Bird Memory is a learning and training memory game. A game for the child with the reproduction of the selected bird. Different levels of difficulty.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 140 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
